comment.author: 34431846@N02
comment._content: Nice image, the Yak-9 looks like a copy & paste job from a Messerschmitt BF109 or am I completely wrong? Then again the Russians took possession of  Messerschmitt Me 262 jet fighters and simply added their insignia, as part of operation paperclip the US moved 50,000 tons of German research papers and thousands of scientists to the US (free repatriation :-) and then the Germans landed on the moon :-0... Nice & interesting collection of images. Thanks

comment.author: 49487266@N07
comment._content: The Yak 7 and 9 came out aftre the 109....so I am sure a little copying was possible!
